name: AS_GSS_SolutionsHubRegistration
description:
Solutions Hub Registration Rule -- GSS solution level

@solutions-hub-registration
sail_code:
a!map(
  name: "Source Selection",
  isSuite: false,
  parentRegistrationReference: rule!AS_GAM_SolutionsHubRegistration,
  version: cons!AS_GSS_TXT_APPLICATION_VERSION,
  supportedCustomization: a!map(
    customObjectApp: a!map(
      name: "GSS Custom Objects",
      appsToHideMissingPrecedents: { cons!AS_GSS_APP_GSS_FULL_APPLICATION }
    ),
    branding: a!map(
      defaultBrandingConfigDoc: cons!AS_GSS_DOC_BRANDING_DEFAULT
    ),
    text: a!map(
      bundleFolders: {
        cons!AS_GSS_FLD_PROPERTIES_FILES,
        cons!AS_GSS_TMG_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
        cons!AS_CO_I18N_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
        cons!AS_ADT_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES
      }
    ),
    rules: {
      a!map(
        defaultRuleRef: rule!AS_GSS_DueAndOverdueEmailSchedule_v1_default,
        friendlyName: "Due And Overdue Email Schedule",
        category: "BUSINESS_LOGIC"
      ),
      a!map(
        defaultRuleRef: rule!AS_GSS_UT_FontDetailsForEmailTemplate_v1_default,
        friendlyName: "Font Details for Email Template",
        category: "BUSINESS_LOGIC"
      ),
      a!map(
        defaultRuleRef: rule!AS_GSS_CustomNightlyProcesses_v1_default,
        friendlyName: "Nightly Process",
        category: "BUSINESS_LOGIC"
      ),
      a!map(
        defaultRuleRef: rule!AS_GSS_CustomPostDeploymentProcesses_v1_default,
        friendlyName: "Post deployment process",
        category: "BUSINESS_LOGIC"
      ),
      a!map(
        defaultRuleRef: rule!AS_GSS_BL_ShowFactorWeight_CDT_v1_default,
        friendlyName: "Factor Weight Visibility Rule (CDT)",
        category: "BUSINESS_LOGIC"
      ),
      a!map(
        defaultRuleRef: rule!AS_GSS_BL_ShowFactorWeight_v1_default,
        friendlyName: "Factor Weight Visibility Rule (Record)",
        category: "BUSINESS_LOGIC"
      ),
      a!map(
        defaultRuleRef: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_v1_default,
        friendlyName: "Enable/Disable State and Local Government (SLG)",
        category: "BUSINESS_LOGIC"
      ),
      a!map(
        defaultRuleRef: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableAppianAIForSummarization_v1_default,
        friendlyName: "Enable/Disable Native AI for Text Summarization",
        category: "BUSINESS_LOGIC"
      )
    }
  )
)
